item.title: How Do I Change Starter Outfit?! Help I Give Good Rep
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

if you are just looking to change the outfit(not armor) go into your character files and mess around with the character look variables i havnt played with them so idk min max value or wat each 1 does hope this helps

item.source: How Do I Change Starter Outfit?! Help I Give Good Rep

item.title: How Do I Change Starter Outfit?! Help I Give Good Rep
item.dc:creator: @Conroy Conroy
item.description:
@Conroy wrote:

first of all open up player.java
then press crtl + F and search for unique
you shud see somthing a little like this

// Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=####; playerEquipment[playerCape]=####; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=####; playerEquipment[playerChest]=####; playerEquipment[playerShield]=####; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=####; playerEquipment[playerHands]=####; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=####; playerEquipment[playerRing]=####; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=####; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=###;

after that fill the #'s with your item ids (-1 for no item) after you filled
save and compile and it should be done. hope this helped ^^

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Starter Outfit?! Help I Give Good Rep

item.title: How Do I Change Starter Outfit?! Help I Give Good Rep
item.dc:creator: @hyphy_ftw hyphy ftw
item.description:
@hyphy_ftw wrote:

go to player.java and do ctrl + F and then type in “giving the player”
should come up with giving the player a unique look. then change it.
hope it helped.
